message:
UIMA-1376 synchronize mergeTypeSystem() method to fix NPE

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/uima/sandbox/trunk@782720 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

UIMA-2495
- fixed NPE for missing parent nodes
- added error message if evaluated types are not defined


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/trunk@1406513 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

UIMA-827

fix NPE for integer based feature values that are null

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-827

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/uima/sandbox/trunk@631573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Jira UIMA-808: fix NPE when servlet is called without any parameters.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-808


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/uima/sandbox/trunk@630848 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

UIMA-1446: Fix NPE in simple server config.  Add test cases.  Update pom while already in there.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-1446


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/uima/sandbox/trunk@796368 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<result>H<out>e</out><out>r</out><out>e</out>'s some text.  The content doesn't matter, as it is
+only used for testing purposes.  We have miserable weather
+today.  Michael's ficus doesn't look too well, I don't
+think it likes standing on top of the radiator in winter.
+If I need more text, I'll come up with more useless nonsense.
+
+</result>
\ No newline at end of file
